Oded Welgreen
projects • music • art • about
I am interested in proceduraly generated art as well as the intersection between art, technology and music. I often try to find a way to combine the three. Here are some of my attempts to explore these concepts.
A visualization and audibilization (conversion of data to sound) of different maze generation algorithms.
An exploration of cellular automata with various rules. Number of living neighbours visualized by color. I also wrote and recorded the music for this video.
A demo of my "Game of Music" project, a music sequencer based on Conway's Game of Life.
